segments.text: Susan has got the cancer of stomach .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How terrible ! This is quite unexpected !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yesterday when I went to hospital to see her , you cannot imagine how greatly surprised when I saw her .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because of atomic cocktail and other medicines , all of them have the side effect . she has lost all her hair .
segments.speaker: S1
